articles.title: NFL Week 8 picks: Upset and score predictions, matchup analysis for every game - NFL.com
articles.description: Can the Ravens get back on track against a hot Bears team? Do the Eagles take revenge on the plucky Giants? Will Aaron Rodgers lead the Steelers past the Packers in a juicy reunion on Sunday Night Football? Check out the Week 8 game picks!
